hint: I hold worlds, but I have no voice until you open me.
I have four feet, drink petrol, and never sleep.
You never see me at night, yet I light your way.
I have legs but never walk. You depend on me to rest.
Kick me or throw me — I always come back round.
I’m white, cold, and live in the fridge.
I walk with you, but I’m not alive.
I stand still and tall, but I change clothes every fall.
I'm a red or green fruit that keeps doctors away.
I have hands but no arms, I run but never walk.
I leave a mark wherever I go, but I’m not a criminal.
I float high and sometimes cry.
I show you who you are but cannot speak a word.
I crack easily and bring life or breakfast.
I’m solid water, but I melt under pressure.
I can open you up without touching your heart.
I sit on your head but never complain.
You visit me when you're tired but leave me when you're strong.
I carry your things but never move on my own.
I hold food without hands.
I fall but never get hurt.
I let you talk without seeing the person.
I brighten your room but don’t shine on my own.
I clean you up but end up down the drain.
I follow you everywhere, but vanish in the dark.
I am something that hides in shadows, waiting for the curious to unravel me.
I take you far, across unknown lands, where the journey is the real treasure.
I stretch beyond sight, full of secrets and waves that never tire.
I am what you leave behind, a mark that lingers even when you're gone.
I draw you in with wonder, a magnet for your attention.
I am the call to the unknown, where every step leads to a new story.
I am the softest sound, carrying secrets only the attentive can hear.
I repeat your voice, yet I’m not really me, just a reflection of your words.
I am the calm within chaos, where the mind rests and time slows.
I am a gentle wind that whispers through the trees.
I am light and soft, found on birds or in pillows.
I am the balance of sounds, where every note and pause fit perfectly together.
I am clear and easily understood, like a clear sky.
I am the quiet companion, where you find peace in your own company.
I’m a fleeting spark of light, just enough to make you wonder where I came from.
I am clear and sharp, reflecting light in ways that reveal hidden beauty.
I move slowly without effort, carried by the winds of change, always flowing.
I am the glimmer in the dark, tiny lights that dance when you least expect.
I take you on an upward journey, where each step brings you closer to the sky.
I’m where the earth meets the sky, always just out of reach, inviting you forward.
I’m the light from distant stars, a soft glow that travels across time and space.
I’m a picture made of many tiny pieces, each unique, yet together I form something whole.
I trick the eyes, but not the mind.
I am the golden touch that breaks through clouds, bringing warmth where shadows linger.
I’m a little light in the dark, flashing in the night to guide you in secret ways.
I’m the silver touch that kisses the earth at night, soft, calm, and serene.
I spin fiercely, pulling everything in my path, then vanish in silence.
I start at one point, but the destination is often unknown.
I protect until you’re ready to emerge, but you won’t see me until it’s time.
I dance through the air, a tune that lingers in your mind.
I’m the kind of color that makes you stop and stare, full of life and detail.
I seem impossible, but I exist in the world of thought.
I flash briefly, leaving a trace of light in the dark.
I shine bright, but never burn; my glow lingers in the air.
I hide the light, only to return with a shadow of mystery.
I show you what is, but not always what you expect to see.
Endless, yet never seen, I stretch beyond the stars.
I am made of many voices, but I speak as one.
A cosmic cloud where stars are born and dreams are made.
I appear real, but I vanish when you get close.
I pull things toward me, but I’m not alive.
I turn things into gold, but only in dreams.
A range of colors, though I’m not a rainbow.
I leave you hanging, waiting for more.
I’m a shadow, but I’m not dark.
I weave stories with threads of time.
I hide secrets beyond the ordinary.
I change, but you might not notice.
I shift colors, but never stay still.
I confuse the lost, but I have no secret doors.
I’m a beat, steady but fleeting.
I bloom, but I’m rooted in place.
I glide over the water, using the wind to carry me on my journey.
I keep you grounded, even in rough waters.
No two of me are the same, yet I’m all alike.
I stand tall with many voices, but I’m often silent.
I help you find your way when you're lost, pointing always to the north.
I tell a story of where you’ve been.
I stand tall, but I’m not a giant.
I untangle, but I never get messy.
I fall in stages, a continuous flow of liquid grace.
I’m a presence that can’t be seen, but can still be felt.
I’m the state of nothingness, where memory fades away.
I bring peace in moments of sorrow, a quiet refuge for the soul.
I’m a song sung in the night, meant to calm and delight.
I’m a playful and unpredictable idea, ever-changing and light.
I can be hidden, waiting to be discovered or lost forever.
No one wins fully when I’m around — yet peace finds me.
I am a mystery, difficult to understand, yet impossible to ignore.
I’m a daydream, a fleeting escape from reality.
I mark the changing of the seasons, the longest or shortest day of the year.
I’m a figment of imagination, something that only exists in the mind.
I belong to the stars, far beyond the earth.
Without me, even castles crumble.
I arrive with memory and name what once was vague.
I come before the moment and stretch it thin.
I am at the forefront, leading the way into new territory.
I live between moments, shifting what is to what will be.
I reverberate, echoing long after the sound is gone.
I am a gentle breeze, caressing everything in my path.
I am the cure-all, a remedy for every ill.
Where paths cross, I wait — full of choice.
I am a sudden realization, a flash of deep understanding.
I obscure the truth, making things unclear on purpose.
I am angelic, pure and radiant, untouched by earthly matters.
I am a wide, sweeping view of a landscape, far and wide.
I am the release of pent-up emotion, leading to renewal.
I shine brightly in the dark, illuminating the path ahead.
I’m the dance between two different needs.
I am complex and refined, intricate in my elegance.
I am the lowest point, the darkest moment in a person's life.
I am the strength to recover from adversity or setbacks.
I am a magical solution, a remedy that can bring renewal.
I am intellectual, relating to the mind and its complex workings.
I am full of chaos, marked by disturbances and upheaval.
I’m thought taking form in the world.
I waste or spend money extravagantly, often recklessly.
I show everything and hide nothing.
I hide my true identity, blending in unnoticed.
I’m what you build before reality knocks.
I am a false name, often used to hide the truth behind identity.
I’m a mystery that even the sharpest minds can't solve.
I glow without heat, lighting up the dark.
I present a choice, but neither option feels right.
I bring forth the truth, often when it's least expected.
I shape the way you see the world, but I’m not always accurate.
I pull you back to the past, making it feel both distant and close.
I neither care nor ignore, I simply don’t react.
I connect the dots so nothing falls apart.
I cause resistance, sometimes slowing things down.
I’m balance and harmony, where one side mirrors the other.
I pay attention to every tiny detail, leaving nothing to chance.
I represent a world where everything is undesirable and chaotic.
I pertain to beauty, often found in art and design.
I am a bittersweet feeling, like a song that plays in the background of your soul.
I change everything, yet leave you somehow the same.
I cause you to think deeply and carefully about something.
I carry great depth and meaning, far beyond the surface.
I am something that is certain to happen, no matter what.
I’m rare, remarkable, and often hard to explain.
I am something that spreads slowly, often causing harm before being noticed.
I’m the peak, the highest point you can reach.
I’m the feeling of hesitating or unwillingness to do something.
I’m something real, authentic, or sincere, without deceit.
I’m the ability to understand or know something without reasoning.
I’m something that changes unpredictably, often dangerously.
I’m something heavy, awkward, and difficult to handle.
I follow you without being seen — until I arrive.
I’m something unclear, open to more than one interpretation.
I’m something temporary or fleeting, not meant to last.
I’m to evoke a feeling or emotion, to strike a chord.
I’m a subtle difference or variation.
I’m of great beauty or excellence, often evoking awe.
I’m distinct or different in kind, not alike.
I’m an extraordinary person, especially a young one with talent.
I’m boldness or daring, often with disregard for safety or propriety.
I’m a special magnetic quality that makes others want to follow or be near me.
I’m so interesting or captivating that I can't be ignored.
I’m what happens when simple parts refuse to stay simple.
I’m an argument or case that’s clear, logical, and convincing.
I stay awake, alert for what others may miss.
I balance the extremes without applause.
I never guess — I measure twice and cut once.
I call forth — sometimes words, sometimes storms.
I’m a piece of the whole — broken but revealing.
I’m not what you see, but what something truly is.
I fix what hurts, though I may be bitter.
I’m the sound of still water and quiet skies.
I pause between the thought and the leap.
I weigh on your shoulders, though unseen.
I show up best when placed beside my opposite.
I knock after the door is already closed.
Once I start, I’m hard to stop.
I lower without lifting a finger.
I speak volumes without saying a word.
I open the door to hurt — and healing.
I guess the future with a trace of logic.
I make things move in perfect harmony.
I take your focus away without you even knowing.
I never stop working, even when no one is watching.
I stay true, even when tempted to bend.
I rise and fall, but never stay the same.
I arrange elements to create something meaningful.
I let you see what’s hidden in plain sight.
I breathe life into what has been lost.
I slip through your fingers just when you think you’ve caught me.
I hide in the shadows, too shy to show myself.
I never give up, even when the path is tough.
I bring together the separate pieces into a unified whole.
I lift you up to a higher place, both physically and mentally.
I drive you to act without giving you a choice.
I stand where you push — sometimes in silence.
I am the intense joy that fills your heart without warning.
I leave you in confusion, wondering what lies beneath the surface.
I arrive when simple things take a detour.
I know everything, all-seeing and all-knowing.
I represent perfect happiness, an idealized and peaceful scene.
I am the outer edge or boundary of an area, object, or concept.
I guide without walking, helping you choose your next turn.
I describe something that can be perceived by touch or is concrete.
I describe something that is extremely beautiful and delicate.
I describe something happening by chance in a happy or beneficial way.
I represent the perfect or most typical example of something.
I describe something too great or extreme to be expressed in words.
I visit when you recall sweet fragments of the past.
I help shape clear thoughts into spoken sounds.
I keep pushing forward even when everything says stop.
I’m small and annoying but can ruin your mood.
I’m a group of stars, but humans gave me stories.
I change the game, not just play it.
I’m a tight knot before something unknown.
I make things faster before you notice it.
I turn a seed of thought into a forest.
I am a transformation, a complete change from one form to another.
I am the act of looking within, examining your own thoughts and feelings.
I echo and resound, repeating like a sound in a cavern.
I am arrogantly superior, looking down on others.
I am insatiable, always hungry for more.
I bring peace after silence or storms.
I turn unity into scattered pieces.
I’m openness, even when it might hurt.
I defy logic, leaving you speechless and puzzled.
I’m experiencing something through someone else’s actions.
I’m something risky or unstable, prone to danger.
I am a sudden moment of realization or insight.
I’m always curious, seeking to know more about everything.
I make your heart race, filling you with excitement.
I come before the moment and stretch it thin.
I glow in the dark, illuminating everything around me.
I am rising above, going beyond ordinary limits.
I describe something that is extremely complex and difficult to follow.
I’m a happy accident, an unexpected gift found when least expected.
I spark change, a force that sets things in motion.
I am light, airy, and almost untouchable.
I am an illusion, made up of impossible parts.
I appear when truth finally steps into the light.
Two truths meet — I live in the clash.
I live between meanings, where clarity blurs.
I nod along, even when I disagree inside.
I speak of virtue while wearing disguise.
I step in when silence won't do.
I trace your path before your feet touch it.
I speak when silence would still be wise.
I wear the crown only if others believe it’s real.
I’m joking, even when I seem serious.
Ich bin rot oder grün und halte den Arzt fern.
Ich spreche nur, wenn du mich öffnest.
Ich habe vier Beine, aber gehe nie.
Ich bin weiß, kalt und wohne im Kühlschrank.
Ich rolle gern und liebe das Spiel.
Ich bin heiß und verschwinde bei Nacht.
Ich fahre schnell, doch habe keine Füße.
Ich stehe still und verliere im Herbst mein Kleid.
Ich habe Zeiger, aber keine Hände.
Ich gehe mit dir, aber nie allein.
